Articles.Content:
For category: Add-on Releases, Add-on Development. Chaos, chaos, chaos. 1.0.2, 1.0, 0.25 very very mixed. Why this category have not sub-category for version 1.0.2, 1.0.0, 0.9, 0.25 ... for better transparency ?

from ../Add-on Releases/ to ../Add-on Releases/<version>/</version>

from ../Add-on Development/ to ../Add-on Development/<version>/</version>
